name: Critical Sun
description:
-`CRITICAL SUN`-

Due to years of misuse the Sun has ran out of fuel supply and everyone wants to get their hands on it . Destroy the Manta race and keep the remaining energy for yourself.

Music from 

https://alexder.itch.io/modern-game-soundtracks-loops 

&  https://roboxel.itch.io/free-space-music

Movement : Mouse 

-Click and to move .

Made for WGJ-150

P.S. this game is currently in development and will receive updates. It is currently more of an endless survival flick.
